about_the_game:
Discovery Notes - Xiaogang Renaissance (with 29999 spiritual coins attached) DLC contains the character Xiaogang Renaissance costume, with the costume gift of 29999 spiritual coins.
I'm not sure whether I'm going to be recruited or not. I'm not sure if I'm going to be recruited.
Village Gathering, Cement Bringing, Family Glory, Because I am extraordinary!
Unique visual design reveals a kind of aristocratic atmosphere of unruly and subversive thinking in magnificence, following a few steps to defend the glory of the family together!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
